text_block_list.name: Pottery Teacher
text_block_list.text:
Pottery is like a mirror that reflects the heart. The best 
trick to creating something wonderful is to know your own heart.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: My own heart……that's……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Just wait for it, Trainer-san! 
I'll make it! I'll put my all in to making it!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: ――Into Trainer-san's new mug!

It all started a few days ago. 
I was taking a break while doing some race research……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
――Trainer-san's mug is really nice～. 
The handle is in the shape of a horseshoe!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
And there's just something warm about it…… 
Ah, is it handmade!?

I nod, looking at the mug in my hand again. Even though it 
was handmade, it was something I made during my school years.
choice_data_list: Yeah, I took a pottery class
Yeah, I took a pottery class

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm～ so there was that kind of class! How nice～! 
……Um, can I take a closer look at it!?

It was just a bit embarrassing, 
but I ended up handing her the mug. And then――
(Buzzzzz)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Hii! A-a-a-a bug! A bug!?
(Slip――crash!)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: I'm really sorry for being so careless, Trainer-san!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
It's impossible to replace it with something identical……but! 
Something that's just as wonderful! I'll definitely make it!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
First, the handle needs to be a horseshoe-shape for sure. 
And the cup has two tones. Turf and dirt-like colors, and then……

But, it was generous of her and 
opportunities like this didn't come often.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Something like this……I guess.

Maybe making things by hand was a hobby for Rhein Kraft. 
I figured she'd be used to it, but it hadn't even been an hour yet!

text_block_list.name: Pottery Teacher
text_block_list.text:
Well, well. Little lady, you're really fast～. And really quite 
good too～. There's no distortions and the thickness is even.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Thank you very much! 
……But.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yeah. 
――As I thought, I'll make it again from the start!

Before I realized it, she had flattened the clay already. 
Even though it was already higher quality than what I had made……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I was thinking, maybe it would be better, if it could hold more. 
That way, you can focus more, during work!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
While it bakes, it'll shrink! 
I need to, make it, a little bigger! Hmmph!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
……Ah, but. If I make it too big, won't it be hard to hold? 
Maybe it just needs to have a nice fit when you're holding it……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Alright! Then, to make it feel better while holding it, 
I'll try adding a wave! ……Hmmph!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Handle……horseshoe. Not too heavy, not too thin, easy to hold…… 
Hmmmmm～, like this, maybe it's a little big……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Color, color, color…… Hmmm, the turf part 
should be this color……the dirt color should 
be this……no, this one maybe! And, the handle……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Fuwaaah～～! It's doneーーーー! 
Trainer-san, Trainer-san! How is it? How does it look!?

text_block_list.name: Pottery Teacher
text_block_list.text:
Fufu, you really worked hard, didn't you～? ……Then, it'll probably 
take about a month and a half to bake. So look forward to it～.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Yeah!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: ……Wait…………a month, and a half……?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Uwaa～～～n! Why did I forget about the baking part～!?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I……I wanted it to be ready for you soon……and now 
it's going to take a whole bunch of time～…… Aww.
choice_data_list: It's not going to take that long

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san……
choice_data_list: You put so much effort in to it, right?
You put so much effort in to it, right?

text_block_list.text:
She spent so much time adjusting the size and shape for comfort. 
Rhein Kraft remade it so many times just for that.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
You're right. 
The feelings……at least those, I put in lots and lots!
And besides――more than that.
choice_data_list: I could see how much you cared about it
I could see how much you cared about it

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Eh? How much……I cared?

She asked, and I answered. For example, how she spent 
hours spinning the clay focusing on the size and shape……

How she kept working with the clay, with a purpose. 
Unwavering, determined. Silently forging ahead, just like……
choice_data_list: Just like a true craftsman, it was shocking

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Shocking……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: I see……shocking, huh……ehehee.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, thank you very much! 
……………………Nfufuu.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Waa～no way! I don't get told that very often so I 
couldn't help smiling! My cheeks just keep tensing up……!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
……Haaa. 
Geez～, Trainer-san.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: It feels like my cheeks are melting……Ehe.
